channel.title: Music on Tobias Berger
channel.description: Recent content in Music on Tobias Berger

item.title: The Radiohead Project - Sentiment Analysis and Music
item.description: I recently discovered this interesting data set , containing all studio album songs of one of my favorite bands of all time - Radiohead. I checked out how the band has progressed over time looking at their 9 studio albums. This meant examining hard facts like song durations and temporal profiles of their records. However I also analyzed softer dimensions like valence, lyrical density and sadness of the words sung.
